tool.name: Tadarida-d
tool.description: Toolbox for Animal Detection on Acoustic Recordings - Detection and Feature extraction part

param.name: fichierSon
param.label: Sound file(s)
param.help: Sound file(s) in Waveform Audio File Format (.wav)

param.name: featureList
param.label: List of features
param.help: Sets the list of features (1 or 2) to be extracted on each detected sound events. More informations availables at https://github.com/YvesBas/Tadarida-D/blob/master/Manual_Tadarida-D.odt (see appendix)

param.name: timeExpension
param.label: Time Expansion Factor
param.help: 10 for 10-times expanded .wav files (most commonly used in bat monitoring) or 1 for direct recordings (only 10 or 1 possible).

param.name: frequencyBand
param.label: Frequency Bands
param.help: Set the frequency bands to be used. 1 allows to treat high frequencies (8 to 250 kHz) whereas 2 treats low frequencies (0.8 to 25 kHz).

tool.help: « .wav files » must be short. Accepted limit depends on sound file characteristics (between 6.4 and 12.8 seconds in high frequency (HF) mode, and between 32 and 64 seconds in low frequency (LF) mode). This limit is necessary for memory consumption and performances of Tadarida-D and Tadarida-C. We recommand treating sound files of 5 seconds duration (or less). More information about Wav format https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WAV.
